channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- APC Easy UPS Online Monitoring Software (Windows 10, 11 Windows Server 2016, 2019, 2022)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- APC Easy UPS Online Monitoring Software (Windows 10, 11 Windows Server 2016, 2019, 2022)

item.title: CVE-2023-29412|2024-08-02T14:07:46.159Z -- schneider%20electric -- apc%20easy%20ups%20online%20monitoring%20software%20%28windows%2010%2C%2011%20windows%20server%202016%2C%202019%2C%202022%29
item.description: CWE-78: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') vulnerability exists that could cause remote code execution when manipulating internal methods through Java RMI interface.

item.title: CVE-2023-29413|2024-08-02T14:07:45.947Z -- schneider%20electric -- apc%20easy%20ups%20online%20monitoring%20software%20%28windows%2010%2C%2011%20windows%20server%202016%2C%202019%2C%202022%29
item.description: A CWE-306: Missing Authentication for Critical Function vulnerability exists that could cause Denial-of-Service when accessed by an unauthenticated user on the Schneider UPS Monitor service.

item.title: CVE-2023-29411|2024-08-02T14:07:46.023Z -- schneider%20electric -- apc%20easy%20ups%20online%20monitoring%20software%20%28windows%2010%2C%2011%20windows%20server%202016%2C%202019%2C%202022%29
item.description: A CWE-306: Missing Authentication for Critical Function vulnerability exists that could allow changes to administrative credentials, leading to potential remote code execution without requiring prior authentication on the Java RMI interface.
